name: clinical_annotator
title: Clinical Variant Annotator
summary: Annotates a VCF File with most recent ClinVar TSV file and with a user provided HGMD PRO VCF file.
whatsNew: *1.0.0 updated execDepends to assetDepends and cleaned up src code;

inputSpec.name: variants_vcfgzs
inputSpec.label: VCF File(s)
inputSpec.help: The VCF File to be annotated (chr prefix must not be present in VCF).

inputSpec.name: variant_summary
inputSpec.label: Variant Summary File
inputSpec.help: A text file containing summarization of variant annotations (one such file can be downloaded here: ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pub/clinvar/tab_delimited/variant_summary.txt.gz).

inputSpec.name: variants_vcfgztbis
inputSpec.label: VCF File Indices
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Tabix index file for VCF to be annotated.

inputSpec.name: hgmd_pro_file
inputSpec.label: HGMD PRO File
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Make sure the build version matches the VCF to be annotated (infomation on purchasing an HGMD PRO license can be found at: https://www.qiagenbioinformatics.com/products/human-gene-mutation-database/).

inputSpec.name: build_version
inputSpec.label: NCBI Build Version
inputSpec.help: Please indicate which build your VCF is (the default is NCBI b38).

outputSpec.name: out_variants_vcfgztbis
outputSpec.label: VCF File Indices
outputSpec.help: VCF index file(s) associated with annotated VCF file(s).
